content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0), (41.0,-86.0)
- Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters connecting the components at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)

### Mixed Ore Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ores
- Stone furnaces at (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5), (-20.5,-59.5)
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Collection chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system for ore movement
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup with:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=20-27)
Power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric pole network distributing power

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items
- Cannot extract items from positions that are too far away - move closer to the target position
- Ensure the target position actually contains the item you're trying to extract

### Errors when inserting items
- Cannot insert items that are not in your inventory
- Make sure you have the required items before attempting to insert them

### Entity placement errors
- Check if target position is already occupied before placing new entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities according to their tile dimensions

### Fluid system errors
- Ensure proper pipe connections between fluid producing/consuming entities
- Check that boilers have fuel before expecting water flow
